# Introduction to the tidyverse

```bash
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

coherant system of packages for data manipulation, exploration and visualisation. All packages share an underlying design philosophy, grammar, and data structures.
developed by hadley wickham 


## tidyverse vs base R

e.g., subsetting with square brackets, making new objects rather than passing through a pipe
